data.text: @Alexand3rTheMeh @wsbgnl Don't forget Delta Airlines calling the shots.

@wsbgnl These quotes continue to suggest that people think "endemic" means "end of pandemic" or "something you just live with" even though that has absolutely nothing to do with the meaning of the term and solves nothing.
@wsbgnl And majority in state STRONGLY support @GovInslee (he was just re-elected!)
@wsbgnl WA today rolled back our strong public health policy I assume BECAUSE there was so much political pressure from CDC/admin. Really horrific

@BujeokHorseman @onyx_coltrane @wsbgnl long term problems become background noise, like poverty. Love Rev Barber for raising it up, but generally that's a background issue if ever there was one. This is a deliberate push of 200-250k deaths & twice yearly infections, of all but those at the top into the same background
@wsbgnl Who wrote this? The use of the word endemic suggests that the writer has never googled its definition

@wsbgnl CDC = Center of Disappearing Credibility    BECAUSE
CDC = Center for Disingenuous Claptrap
@wsbgnl The chain of events reported here is completely backwards. How can this be in the "news" section without being fact checked?
